title: Benjamin Boyce's Convo with PVK and Jonathan Pageau - Healing from Fragmentation and Turning to God
description:
What is going on these days as we try to understand the religion of Wokeness.The fragmentation and turmoil call for a solution.   For Paul and Jonathan, there is only one way to go - to follow Christ, but what does that mean for a mostly secular society? Is God too cringy? Plus a major pattern is dying, despite shrill declarations to the contrary. 

https://youtu.be/JdTOnHenKJA

African American History Museum poster: https://twitter.com/ByronYork/status/1283372233730203651/photo/2
